cosmos.question: I'm big and yellow and shine so bright, I keep the world warm with my light! What am I?

hints.text: I come out during the day!
Birds sing when I'm in the sky!

cosmos.question: I am round and white, and I come out at night! Sometimes I'm big, sometimes I'm small. What am I?
I twinkle way up high, like diamonds in the sky! What am I?
Sometimes it falls, it goes fast. It shines, it might be trash, but it's from space. What is it?

hints.text: It's like a shooting star, but it is not.
It burns up in the atmosphere.

cosmos.question: I‚Äôm big and blue and have lots of water. People and animals live here, who am I?

hints.text: There are trees and oceans here

cosmos.question: I go around and around the Sun. The moon goes around me. What am I?

hints.text: The solar system exists because of it.

cosmos.question: I am big and red and live next to Earth. People want to visit me one day. What planet am I?

hints.text: It is named after the Roman god of war.

cosmos.question: I'm a very big ball of gas, much bigger than the Earth! I have many moons around me. What planet am I?

hints.text: I have a big red spot.
I am named after the king of the Roman gods.

cosmos.question: I have pretty rings around me, made of ice and rock! What planet am I?

hints.text: I am named after the Roman god of agriculture.
I am primarily made of gas.

cosmos.question: I am very far away. I am the last planet in our solar system from the Sun. What planet am I?

hints.text: I am very cold and blue!
It is named after the Roman god of the sea.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: You can find me in a field.

plant.question: I am big and tall and have leaves and a trunk. What am I?

hints.text: Birds like to build nests in me.

plant.question: I am red and yummy, and grow on a plant. What am I?

hints.text: You can eat me as a snack.

plant.question: I have pretty colors and smell nice. Bees like me! What am I?

hints.text: I am not green all over.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: My shape is long and round.
Some people put me on their face at the spa.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Monkeys like to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: You have to crack me open.

plant.question: I am yellow and grow in a field. I am tall and you can make popcorn from me! What am I?

hints.text: My leaves are long and green.
Birds and squirrels like to steal my kernels.

plant.question: I am round and orange and grow on a vine. People carve faces on me for Halloween! What am I?

hints.text: I am used for decorations in autumn.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a plant. You can make yummy bread with me. What am I?
I am a prickly plant that grows in the desert. I don't need much water! What am I?

hints.text: I can store lots of water inside me.
